author: Jon Fingas
title: UK internet providers will lift data caps during COVID-19 pandemic
description: The UK is echoing others in lifting internet restrictions to keep people online during the COVID-19 pandemic.  Major telecoms like BT/EE, Openreach and Virgin Media have struck an agreement that will remove "all" data caps on current landline broadband servic…
content:
Telecoms will have to provide "alternative methods of communication" if the outbreak prevents repairs to landlines. They'll likewise have to ensure customers are "treated fairly" if they have a hard time paying their bills.
ISPs have already made some accomm… [+450 chars]
